jd: From: Tamkeen Aslam, Orbit People tamkeen.aslam@orbitpeople.com Reply to: tamkeen.aslam@orbitpeople.com Hi, Hope you are doing well! Please find below Job description, and send some quality profiles!Job Title: Sr. Project ManagerRemote (CA Preferred) NEED ONLY WHO ARE LOCAL TO CALIFORNIA CANDIDATES, PMP CERTIFIED CANDIDATES ONLY.Job DescriptionManage a team of mid to senior level managers, solution consultants and leads.Collaborate with delivery managers on sprint planning, build and testing estimations, deployment and operational handoff to the support team.Collaborate with product managers and business SME to capture precise business requirements and provide guidance on solution roadmap.Collaborate with a cross functional and technical team to deliver the solutionWhat are the top 3 skills required for this role? Min 4+ Years of experience in Project Management, PMP is a must. Overall 12+ years’ experience.Experience managing Retail & Supply chain projects is must.Experience building, leading teams, and managing large cross functional stakeholders on enterprise scale projects and managing project finances including reviewing SOW/contract, forecasting are must.Prior project management experience with the Apparel industry and experience in Sustainability Reporting is preferred.Experience in Hybrid projects would be a plus.12+ years ( 4+ project management experience)
